Index: =================================================================== --- +++ @@ -0,0 +1,133 @@ +import React, { useState } from 'react'; +import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; + +export default function Kids() { + const [priceFilter, setPriceFilter] = useState("all"); + const [sortOrder, setSortOrder] = useState("none"); + + const images = [ + "https://i.imgur.com/1u5wFvM.png", + "https://i.imgur.com/e3yPOi3.png", + "https://i.imgur.com/dYT6p1O.png", + "https://i.imgur.com/l3V1z6a.png", + "https://i.imgur.com/7C4F1oz.png", + "https://i.imgur.com/9tbC1kZ.png", + "https://i.imgur.com/tMNli2W.png", + "https://i.imgur.com/jZJrPfa.png", + "https://i.imgur.com/FQfMS0V.png", + "https://i.imgur.com/4NHtH9U.png", + "https://i.imgur.com/1dhuXhS.png", + "https://i.imgur.com/YwF62tM.png", + "https://i.imgur.com/Dudx6JX.png", + "https://i.imgur.com/V44Vq3f.png", + "https://i.imgur.com/wg8uShy.png", + "https://i.imgur.com/HcHfC0w.png", + "https://i.imgur.com/Rk0gGVp.png", + "https://i.imgur.com/k4YcG1f.png", + "https://i.imgur.com/WHKZ8IV.png", + "https://i.imgur.com/jxbsuIr.png", + ]; + + const products = Array.from({ length: 20 }).map((_, i) => ({ + id: 300 + i, + title: `Kids Product ${i + 1}`, + description: "High quality product for kids with premium materials.", + price: Math.floor(Math.random() * 200) + 20, + category: "kids-items", + thumbnail: images[i], + })); + + // ---------- Filter ---------- + let filteredProducts = products; + + if (priceFilter === "low") { + filteredProducts = products.filter((p) => p.price < 100); + } + if (priceFilter === "mid") { + filteredProducts = products.filter((p) => p.price >= 100 && p.price <= 300); + } + if (priceFilter === "high") { + filteredProducts = products.filter((p) => p.price > 300); + } + + // ---------- Sort ---------- + if (sortOrder === "asc") { + filteredProducts = [...filteredProducts].sort((a, b) => a.price - b.price); + } + if (sortOrder === "desc") { + filteredProducts = [...filteredProducts].sort((a, b) => b.price - a.price); + } + + return ( +
+

Kids Products

+ + {/* Filter + Sort */} +
+ + + + + +
+ + {/* Products */} +
+ {filteredProducts.map((p) => ( +
+ +
+ + + +
+
{p.title}
+ +

Category: {p.category}

+ +

+ {p.description.split(" ").slice(0, 10).join(" ") + "..."} +

+ +
+ ${p.price} + + + View + +
+
+ +
+ +
+ ))} +
+
+ ); +}
